instruction.en: Put thermostat in installer mode(dip switch 1 On), turn the dial to ‘L’ and press the dial.   Full instructions: https://forum.athom.com/discussion/comment/42270/#Comment_42270
instruction.nl: Zet de thermostaat in installer mode(dip switch 1 On), draai de knop naar ‘L’ en druk op de knop.   Volledige instructies: https://forum.athom.com/discussion/comment/42270/#Comment_42270

hint.en: Default is Celcius, Check on is Kelvin
hint.nl: Standaard is Celcius, Check aan is Kelvin

label.en: Defines the temperature steps of the heating control.
label.nl: Definieert de stappen van de temperatuurbesturing.

hint.en: Value is multiplied by 0.1 °С/°F.   So 10 means 1°С/°F
hint.nl: Waarde wordt vermenigvuldigd met 0.1 °С/°F.   Dus 10 betekend 1°С/°F

instruction.en: Press the button and hold it for at least 1 second, than release
instruction.nl: Druk de knop minimaal 1 seconde in, laat daarna los

hint.en:
Configure the delta based temperature report.
To configure Delta temperature reporting to 2 °C. The value need to configured in device is 2/0.1 = 20.

Controllers may only allow configuring signed values. In order to set values in the range 128…255, the value sent in the application shall be equal to desired value minus 256. For example, to set Delta Temperature to 130, it may be needed to set a value 130−256=−126.

Configure the time interval based temperature report.
Controllers may only allow configuring signed values. In order to set values in the range 128…255, the value sent in the application shall be equal to desired value minus 256. For example, to set Delta Temperature to 130, it may be needed to set a value 130−256=−126.
